greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(n) = tau(n) + n - 2 for n > 1.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: a(4) = 5 = sum of row 4 terms of triangle A134870: (1 + 2 + 1 + 1).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 14 2007
ext: Name changed, a(12) corrected and a(15)-a(67) from _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 10 2018
